bookTitle: Heart Centered Living: Messages Inspired by Christ Consciousness
Plot: This book is a guide on your way to heart-centered living. Living from the heart means that you live according to your soul's calling and that you truly express your unique gifts on Earth. Before you find the peace and joy this brings, you may encounter deep fear, doubt and loneliness inside. This book guides you on the inner path from ego to heart and brings you closer to your own soul.
